Question: How do I reset my SSO password?
Resolution: Navigate to https://sso.acme-corp.com/reset and follow the MFA prompts. Note: Passwords must be 12+ characters with a symbol.

Question: My account is locked. What do I do?
Resolution: Accounts lock after 5 failed attempts. Please wait 15 minutes for an auto-unlock or contact IT via Slack for immediate reset.

Question: I didn't receive my MFA push notification.
Resolution: Ensure your phone has an internet connection. Try using the 'Enter Code' offline option in your Authenticator app.

Question: What is the staff Wi-Fi password?
Resolution: Staff Wi-Fi uses your SSO credentials. Connect to 'ACME-Staff' and enter your corporate username and password.

Question: How do I connect guests to Wi-Fi?
Resolution: Guests should use 'ACME-Guest'. No password required but they must accept the Terms and Conditions in the pop-up browser.

Question: My VPN connection is very slow.
Resolution: Switch to a wired connection if possible. If on Wi-Fi try moving closer to the router or disconnect other high-bandwidth devices.

Question: How do I update my email signature?
Resolution: Go to File > Options > Mail > Signatures. Use the official company template found on the Intranet under 'Brand Identity'.

Question: My microphone is not working in Teams.
Resolution: Check 'Device Settings' in Teams and ensure the correct input device is selected. Test your mic in the system sound settings.

Question: Where are my Zoom cloud recordings stored?
Resolution: Recordings are synced to your 'My Documents/Zoom' folder and also available at https://zoom.acme-corp.com/recordings.

Question: My laptop battery drains very quickly.
Resolution: Reduce screen brightness; close background apps like Chrome or Slack when not in use. If the battery health is below 80% request a replacement.

Question: My external monitor looks blurry.
Resolution: Ensure you are using a high-quality DisplayPort or HDMI cable. In Windows/Mac settings set the resolution to 'Native' (e.g. 1920x1080).

Question: My peripherals won't connect through the dock.
Resolution: Unplug the USB-C/Thunderbolt cable from your laptop and the power from the dock. Wait 10 seconds and reconnect both.

Question: I need admin rights to install software.
Resolution: Standard software can be installed via the 'Self-Service Portal'. For other apps submit a 'Temporary Admin Rights' request in Slack.

Question: I think I received a phishing email.
Resolution: Do not click any links. Forward the email to phishing-report@acme-corp.com and then delete it from your inbox.

Question: My disk is almost full.
Resolution: Use 'Disk Cleanup' (Windows) or 'Storage Management' (Mac) to remove temp files. Move large project files to the cloud (OneDrive/Box).

Question: How do I share my screen in the meeting room?
Resolution: Connect the HDMI cable to your laptop or use the wireless 'ShareLink' code displayed on the room's TV screen.

Question: The printer has a paper jam.
Resolution: Follow the physical instructions on the printer's LCD screen. Most jams occur in Tray 2 or Door A.

Issue: The screen of my pc is broken...
Question: The screen of my pc is broken
Resolution: You can contact the IT department at 2391-1231
